body: Hey guys :) I'm Alekpower, and I've been around a long time.<br id="null"> <br id="null">Sadly, I don't play much anymore but I love to see what funky has been doing with this server.<br id="null"><br id="null">I used to be really into Minecraft PvP when I was young - I was one of the original makers of the original Show Your Face To The World thread before Awarrior took over - I was also part of the Sistahood, if that means anything. (Also used to be a Jr. Mod for like four months when Avicus was first released apart from McZone)<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Ask me anything, I will try to reply!
